name: Hunger of Life
description: You can choose your character between a skeleton and a vampire. Once the game started, you will fell unlimited hunger so that you must kill those monsters in the dungeon to keep yourself alive. You can press W/A/S/D in the keyboard to move, and press J or K to attack monsters. You can also press Space to roll( while there might be some bugs XD) After monsters' death, there will be some meat you can press J to eat, and you can go to the next level through the door at right of the room.
